DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the maximum tolerated dose of alloreactive NK cells that can be transfused following stem cell transplant.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Trial of Alloreactive Cell Infusion Following Transplantation of Haplotype Cells in Patients With Myeloid Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Patients must have histologically documented AML, ALL, MDS, CML, Identification of haploidentical donor LVEF > 45% corrected DLCO > 50% predicted Serum Creatinine <= 2 mg/dL Bilirubin < 2 x ULN AST, ALT < 2 x ULN Age â‰¤ 65 years Performance Status 01 Patients relapsing <6 months after autologous SCT are not eligible.
